level.text: The Director of Procurement shall be responsible for establishment of contract files containing the records of each of the following:
The documentation in each contract file shall be sufficient to constitute a complete history of the transaction, in accordance with § 1202.2 of Title 27 DCMR.
Each bid or proposal file shall be kept for a minimum of three (3) years, and shall contain the following information:
The bid or proposal opening and closing dates;
A general description of the procurement item;
The names of bidders or offerors contacted and the nature of the contact, as well as, the names of all bidders or offerors that respond to the solicitation; and

In addition to the requirements of § 2104.3, any other information required for bid or proposal evaluation also must be entered into the abstract or record and be available for public inspection upon request.
